testcase.name: Get Item name of MenuItems should be called Cola
Get Item name of MenuItems should be called Coffee
Get Item name of MenuItems should be called Cheese Sandwich
Get Item name of MenuItems should be called Steak Sandwich
Price of Item should Cola price should be 50p
Price of Item should Coffee price should be £1
Price of Item should Cheese Sandwich price should be £2
Item is hot should be false for Cola
Item is hot should be true for Coffee
Item is hot should be false for Cheese Sandwich
Item is hot should be true for Steak Sandwich
Item is a drink should be true for Cola
Item is a drink should be true for Coffee
Item is a drink should be false for Cheese Sandwich
Item is a drink should be false for Steak Sandwich
The total of items should cost £8
if items are drinks there should be no service charge when drinks are included in the list
